message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth to you, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,150,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course, so feel free to share your thoughts.

I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe it's a bit more in line with my budget and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet on this price.

Bob, I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product and your offer.  However, $900,000 significantly undervalues its true potential.  I could consider a price of $1,075,000. This reflects a willingness to negotiate while still recognizing the immense value this brings.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $950,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll be getting from the product.
